name: Order Processing
description: Order processing flow demonstrating different protocol types
diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    title: Order Processing with Protocol Types
    participant Client
    participant API as API Gateway
    participant SAP as SAP System
    participant Legacy as Legacy Service
    participant Queue as Message Queue

    Client->>API: Create Order @type(JSON) @path(POST /api/orders)
    API->>SAP: Create Sales Order @type(RFC_SAP) @path(BAPI_SALESORDER_CREATEFROMDAT2)
    SAP-->>API: Sales Order Created @type(RFC_SAP)
    API->>Legacy: Get Customer @type(SOAP) @path(/CustomerService.asmx)
    Legacy-->>API: Customer Data @type(XML)
    API->>Queue: Order Event @type(BINARY) @async
    API-->>Client: Order Confirmation @type(JSON)
